about_the_game:
You and your fellow soldiers have just been crushed by the hands of Knight Empress Carla, you alone are the soul survivor and the only thing keeping you alive is the sadistic joy she experiences keeping you alive taunting you. Eventually any thrills she was getting from the scenario were overshadowed by the disgust she felt as your lewd gaze washed over her body, even at the brink of death you're rock hard, truly a pervert without equal. Just as she is about the strike the finishing blow *CLANG* her sword is blocked by a second equally beautiful knight, Erika, whose kingdom also suffered Carla's wrath.

After those two fight to a stalemate and Carla ultimately escapes, things should start looking up, you did just get saved by a beautiful woman! Who knows, maybe she wanted to save you out of more than just noble knightly obligation!? Unfortunately that is not the case... Erika and her Blue Rose Knights are disgusted by you who can't hide your boner or keep your eyes off their tits and asses and instead of a happily ever after you're left to fend for yourself as Erika and her Knights head off to pursue Carla.

Wandering lost and alone after being brushed off by Erika instead of complaining about being left without food and drink the biggest issue is that you blew your chance to try and fuck Erika or at least one of her subordinates! With these thoughts swirling in your head, suddenly a voice echoes in your mind!

"Come to me, lustful one."


That's right, at the brink of death one only driven by horniness can hear the voice of the legendary CURSED MAGIC SWORD! Being near death and delirious you heed the words and reach out for the sword, as you do a huge surge of magic rushes through you and you suddenly understand how to bend those gorgeous knights to your will...

Etch a crest unto their flesh and seize control of their bodies!


Carla, Erika, and every other sexy knight in the world will soon become your ever loyal sex slaves as they offer themselves to join your Order of Onahole Knights!

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • The female knights are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with animated character sprites
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • Put the sturdiness of The Pound Table to the test, as you get down and dirty with 5 sexy lady-knights!

Sexcalibur: Knights of the Pound Table is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: An apology fit for a king
The order of the Onahole Knights!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Allusions to, and threats of violence. 
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- Characters engage in BDSM, elements including; domination, tattooing, sexual accessories, humiliation bondage, and impact play.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Characters are blackmailed/coerced into performing sexual acts.
- Some scenes include characters engaging in non consensual sexual acts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
